document_data.name: Penri
document_data.mainbody: '''Penri''' was a [[korobokuru]] forest [[barbarian]] adventurer in [[Miyama Province]] in [[Kozakura]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History:
Penri born in the [[Bear Clan]] in northern Kozakura. The Bear korobokuru were at war with the [[Kozakuran]]s until 1357 DR when the humans won and the korobokuru had to escape into mountainous and snowy forests, struggling to survive.

Penri was chosen to go in search of allies and he decided to travel to Miyama.
